mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, q.* FROM ( SELECT row_number() over (order by input_date desc) as view_num, qna_num, category, title, content, user_id, input_date FROM qna WHERE flag = '답변대기' ORDER BY input_date DESC ) q WHERE rownum <= #{endItemIndex} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startItemIndex}
select count(*) from qna where flag = '답변대기'

select qna.category, qna.input_date, qna.title, qna.content, qna_answer.ans_title, qna_answer.reply_date, qna_answer.ans_content from qna, qna_answer where ( qna_answer.qna_num(+) = qna.qna_num ) and qna.qna_num = #{qna_num}
select row_number() over (order by input_date desc) as view_num, qna_num, category, title, input_date from qna where flag = '답변완료' order by input_date desc

select qna.category, qna.input_date, qna.title, qna.content, qna_answer.ans_title, qna_answer.reply_date, qna_answer.ans_content from qna inner join qna_answer on qna.qna_num = qna_answer.qna_num where qna.qna_num = #{qna_num}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_answer(ans_content, qna_num, ans_title) values (#{ans_content}, #{qna_num}, #{ans_title} )
mapper.update: update qna set flag = '답변완료' where qna_num = #{qna_num} and flag = '답변대기'
